XML Format: CapabilityStatement-dpc-capabilities

Raw xml 


<CapabilityStatement xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="dpc-capabilities"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">This is a narrative</div>
  </text>
  <version value="0.3.0-SNAPSHOT"/>
  <status value="draft"/>
  <date value="2019"/>
  <publisher value="Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services"/>
  <kind value="capability"/>
  <software>
    <name value="Data @ Point of Care API"/>
    <version value="0.3.0-SNAPSHOT"/>
    <releaseDate value="2019"/>
  </software>
  <fhirVersion value="3.0.1"/>
  <acceptUnknown value="extensions"/>
  <format value="application/json"/>
  <format value="application/fhir+json"/>
  <rest>
    <mode value="server"/>
    <resource>
      <type value="Practitioner"/>
      <interaction>
        <code value="create"/>
      </interaction>
      <interaction>
        <code value="update"/>
      </interaction>
      <interaction>
        <code value="delete"/>
      </interaction>
      <interaction>
        <code value="search-type"/>
      </interaction>
      <versioning value="no-version"/>
      <searchParam>
        <name value="identifier"/>
        <type value="string"/>
      </searchParam>
    </resource>
    <resource>
      <type value="StructureDefinition"/>
      <interaction>
        <code value="read"/>
      </interaction>
      <versioning value="no-version"/>
    </resource>
    <interaction>
      <code value="batch"/>
    </interaction>
  </rest>
</CapabilityStatement>
